TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现根据字符串输入返回 的标记扩展。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that returns a based on a string input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况信息，请参阅[X:type 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md). > [!NOTE] > `{x:Type}`功能通常是从标记的用户代码调用。The `{x:Type}` functionality is generally for user code invocation from markup. 对于正在实现的 XAML 支持的代码，类型解析服务来自，与起作用的实现的 XAML 架构上下文。For code that is implementing XAML support, type resolution services come from and are related to the implementation of the acting XAML schema context. 请不要尝试引用来替代服务提供程序; 你传入的上下文可能不是有效的类型解析，并尝试不使用有效的服务调用将会失败。Do not attempt to reference as a substitute for a service provider; the context you pass in might not be valid for a type resolution, and attempts to call without valid services will fail. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 类型引用通常用于样式、 模板和数据绑定功能区中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，当这些功能所引用的 XAML。Type references are commonly used for style, template, and databinding feature areas in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], when these features are referenced by XAML.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeName) cil managed

param.name: typeName
param.span: 标识要引用的类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the type to make a reference to.

param.span: 此字符串使用格式 prefix:className。

span.span: This string uses the format prefix:className.

param.span: prefix 是 XAML 命名空间的映射前缀，并且仅用于未映射到默认 XAML 命名空间的引用类型。

span.span: prefix is the mapping prefix for a XAML namespace, and is only required to reference types that are not mapped to the default XAML namespace.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并根据提供的 字符串初始化 值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the value based on the provided string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数中对其进行设置时，则不会计算此值。This value is not evaluated when you set it in the constructor. 如果该值不是`null`，最初接受此值。If the value is not `null`, the value will be initially accepted. 实际分析和的值计算将推迟至分析 XAML 时和与可用的服务上下文处于活动状态，对此扩展，调用。The actual parsing and evaluation of the value is deferred until is called on this extension, when XAML is parsed and with available service contexts active. 在此时间`typeName`预期可解析为返回的 XAML 架构上下文中的类型和该类型。At this time the `typeName` is expected to be resolvable as a type within a XAML schema context, and that type is returned.

span.span: Attempted to specify as .

param.name: type
param.span: 将通过此 表示的类型。

span.span: The type to be represented by this .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并直接声明类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, declaring the type directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是运行的时代码用法的一个帮助器方法并不是标记扩展的正常实现模式的一部分。This is a helper method for run time code usages of and is not part of the normal implementation pattern for a markup extension.

span.span: is

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.

param.span: 此提供程序应为 提供服务。

span.span: The provider is expected to provide a service for .

summary.span: 返回一个应在应用了此扩展的属性上设置的对象。

span.span: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this extension is applied.

summary.span: 对于 ，这是为请求的类型名称计算的 值。

span.span: For , this is the value as evaluated for the requested type name.

returns.span: 要在应用了扩展的属性上设置的 。

span.span: The to set on the property where the extension is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将传递`null`为`serviceProvider`，但只有当此实例构造函数中已建立具有初始 true 类型而不是`typeName`。You can pass `null` for `serviceProvider`, but only if this instance was established with an initial true type in the constructor rather than a `typeName`. 否则，此标记扩展实现依赖于服务基于已传递`serviceProvider`。Otherwise, this markup extension implementation relies on services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不得为`null`。It must not be `null`. `serviceProvider`应提供的服务。The `serviceProvider` is expected to provide a service for .

exception.span: 字符串的某部分未进行正确分析。

span.span: Some part of the string did not parse properly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Type ^ Type { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此扩展的类型信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the type information for this extension.
The established type.

value.span: 对运行时而言，这可以是 以表示 get 访问，但不能设置为 。

span.span: For runtime purposes, this may be for get access, but cannot be set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非使用有意实例化此实例签名构造函数，此值将为`null`。Unless this instance was deliberately instantiated with the signature constructor, this value will be `null`. 此属性不会重置时调用。This property will not be reset when is called. 如果你想表示的实际类型都应该调用而不检查此属性。If you want the true type represented you should always call rather than check this property. 此属性是可设置每个有关标记扩展用法的常用规则。This property is settable per usual rules regarding markup extension usage. 但是，如果你要设置与，则此标记扩展的目的是不相关的因为相同从返回调用。However, if you are setting with a , then the purpose of this markup extension is irrelevant, because the same is returned from a call.

span.span: Attempted to set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此标记扩展所表示的类型名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the type name represented by this markup extension.

value.span: 用于标识类型的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the type.

value.span: 此字符串使用格式*前缀*:*className*。

span.span: This string uses the format *prefix*:*className*.

value.span: (*前缀*是一个 XML 命名空间中，映射前缀，并且只需引用 wpf 未映射到默认 XML 命名空间的类型 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpfxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpfxmlnsv1-md.md)])。

span.span: (*prefix* is the mapping prefix for an XML namespace, and is only required to reference types that are not mapped to the default XML namespace for WPF ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpfxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpfxmlnsv1-md.md)]).
Attempted to set to .
